verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> How blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man <S%H376><s%> who fears <S%H3372><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> Who greatly <S%H3966><s%> delights <S%H2654><s%> in His commandments. <S%H4687><s%>
His descendants <S%H2233><s%> will be mighty <S%H1368><s%> on earth; <S%H776><s%> The generation <S%H1755><s%> of the upright <S%H3477><s%> will be blessed. <S%H1288><s%>
Wealth <S%H1952><s%> and riches <S%H6239><s%> are in his house, <S%H1004><s%> And his righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever. <S%H5703><s%>
Light <S%H216><s%> arises <S%H2224><s%> in the darkness <S%H2822><s%> for the upright; <S%H3477><s%> [He is] gracious <S%H2587><s%> and compassionate <S%H7349><s%> and righteous. <S%H6662><s%>
It is well <S%H2896><s%> with the man <S%H376><s%> who is gracious <S%H2603><s%> and lends; <S%H9233><s%> He will maintain <S%H3557><s%> his cause <S%H1697><s%> in judgment. <S%H4941><s%>
For he will never <S%H5769><s%> <S%H3808><s%> be shaken; <S%H4131><s%> The righteous <S%H6662><s%> will be remembered <S%H2143><s%> forever. <S%H5769><s%>
He will not fear <S%H3372><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> tidings; <S%H8052><s%> His heart <S%H3820><s%> is steadfast, <S%H3559><s%> trusting <S%H982><s%> in the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>
His heart <S%H3820><s%> is upheld, <S%H5564><s%> he will not fear, <S%H3372><s%> Until <S%H5704><s%> he looks <S%H7200><s%> [with satisfaction] on his adversaries. <S%H6862><s%>

He has given <S%H5414><s%> freely <S%H6340><s%> to the poor; <S%H34><s%> His righteousness <S%H6666><s%> endures <S%H5975><s%> forever; <S%H5703><s%> His horn <S%H7161><s%> will be exalted <S%H7311><s%> in honor. <S%H9202><s%>

The wicked <S%H7563><s%> will see <S%H7200><s%> it and be vexed; <S%H3707><s%> He will gnash <S%H2786><s%> his teeth <S%H8127><s%> and melt <S%H4549><s%> away; <S%H4549><s%> The desire <S%H8378><s%> of the wicked <S%H7563><s%> will perish.
